title: How does the shared champion pool mechanic in Teamfight Tactics work exactly?
body:
Does it work the same way as Dota 2 Auto chess where when a hero is bought, it removes 1 out of the 50 heroes that are in the champion pool, Then returned when sold or lost due to a defeat.

Or does it work by how many times it appears in the shop, and reduced by 1 for every copy of the champion that is found.

replies.body: we should ask to Dota to let Riot know how it works

Yeah I don't think anyone knows at this point.  Sometimes certain champs are just not found anywhere, either.  I've played a game where it was round 5, and only 1 zed had ever been on anyone's board, and I was hard rolling for him.  Still no zed.

It's a mystery.

I've had the exact same issue, I've had games where not a single Garen or Darius pops up. I've even rerolled 80 gold at the end to see if I could find atleast one and still none, that's why I'm asking this because the champion pools seem extremely inconsistent and/or just flawed overall.
